title: Bulali
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Uses organic, natural and local products as much as possible and does not use artificial preservatives or colorings. Vegetarian and vegan dishes are clearly labelled on menu. All coffee and cocoa drinks are organic and local. All vendors are certified organic and/or maintain eco-friendly practices. Located in the upscale Avenida Escazu center with an open kitchen and bakery. Free Wi-Fi. Ample parking.
